title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Impact of Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) on Language Learning and Pedagogy

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can explain three or more technical and emotional barriers encountered during language learning in ERT environments
Participants can design two or more effective language learning strategies in digital environments using VR-based simulations
Participants can identify five or more positive and negative impacts of ERT on language education by analyzing qualitative interview data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
